synopsis.text:
Sometime after their triumph in the 63rd Sensha-dou tournament, the girls of Oarai Girls High School face an unexpected challenge. Despite their hard-won victory, the Japanese Ministry of Education plans to decommission their school, putting the future of their cherished institution in jeopardy. In a desperate bid to save their school, Miho and her relatively inexperienced tankery team must go head-to-head with a formidable university Sensha-dou team in a high-stakes battle.

Outmatched and outnumbered, the odds seem insurmountable for the Oarai team. However, they find hope and support in the most unexpected places. Teaming up with their former rivals and newfound friends from Chihatan Academy and Keizoku High School, Miho and her friends prepare for the biggest battle of their lives.

With their school's fate hanging in the balance, the girls must rely on their wits, teamwork, and unbreakable spirit to outmaneuver their experienced opponents. Can they emerge victorious and save their beloved school from closure? Join Miho and her friends as they embark on an epic journey to protect their home and prove that the power of friendship can overcome even the most daunting challenges.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
